channel.title: üèÅ List of Completed FM Games - 2021
channel.description:
This is a list of the completed games played at least partially within 2021 and sorted by the ending date. [color=steblue]FM games[/color] are in [color=steblue]blue[/color] and [color=orange]Misc games[/color] are in [color=orange]orange[/color]. Emoji are used to indicate the alignments.
:joy_cat: Town :wolf: Scum :monkey_face: Neutral
For additions or corrections, please contact @Whysper (Discord: **Whysper#1313**).
---
### [color=steblue]Total 2021 FM Games: 33 [ :joy_cat: 15 :white_small_square: 18 :wolf: ][/color] ### [color=orange]Total 2021 Misc Games: 17[/color]
---
